reviews.review: Amazing movie... words can't explain of the ending.
Infinity war left everyone in the room speechless... the room was quiet, so quiet. This movie swept every Marvel movie off the table. Hands down the best movie ever. Devastation...
Awesome, epic, emotional, etc. Infinity war is all of these things and more. It may be rushed on some parts, and it may be tiring. In my opinion it's all worth it in the end.
Great movie! If you like comic books at all!

Cannot be seen as a standalone movie. I already knew that Tom Holland, Zoe Saldana, Robert Downey Jr. and Benedict Cumberbatch were good actors, but they're the ones who really gave this comic book movie depth.

One of the most humanistic super hero movies I have seen. Visually-busy action scenes, as expected; however, nice balance of humor and drama as well. The quality of an action hero movie was bumped up a notch.

While not perfect, considering the sheer amount of characters and locales and exposition required to properly tell this story, it managed to pack a lot more emotional impact and excellent character work than I thought possible. Plus some of the best action the mcu has seen so far.

Okay well initially I was worried about that there were too many big super hero's and that there would be a lot of unbalance and misrepresentation of character...however they did a good job maintaining that balance between all the characters and new relationships were forged, not to mentioned that they were able to have character development for thanos which I appreciated. Overall although the film runs 2.5 hrs with the previews, it is a a long movie. And it sets up for marvel phase 4

I really loved this movie. Good villan, fun interactions between the many characters, really cool action sequences, really good special effects, some really funny jokes, and an awesome ending. This is probably one of my favorite movies of all time. Can't wait for the next one.
